Name: Into the Abyss
About the game: STORY: Into the Abyss is a retro 2D-RPG with a classic vibe and exciting storyline. You are Sonja, a student of necromancy fighting to rid the world of a terrible illness that's taking the lives of all mankind, even your loved ones. Fight alongside a zombie, a witch and even death in this exciting journey of persistence, friendship and determination. FEATURES: Classic Storyline Witty Dialogue Innovative Party Members MORE GAMES: / / /
